summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: SELF/ish Men's Face Scrub | Exfoliating Facial Cleanser | Deep Cleansing | Effective Shave Prep & Beard Exfoliator for Men | Natural Ingredients | 3.4fl oz
Review Date: 2020/08/15
Store: MELARQT
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MELARQT', 'Item Form': 'Scrub', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.26 x 2.09 x 2.01 inches; 4.73 Ounces', 'Department': 'Men', 'UPC': '810042384002'}
Review Text: This face wash is so exfoliating and smells great. It works really well on the beard area and preps the skin for a nice, super smooth shave. It doesn’t seem to strip the face of natural oils, which is great. Overall, it just leaves a really soft, clean, oil-free (the bad oils) look and feel. I would definitely recommend this for a nice clean face, especially for men with bushy beards.
Review Title: Great for a soft clean face & beard
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Magnetic Eyelashes by UJM，3 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelash and Eyeliner Kit Natural Look False Lashes with Mirror and Tweezers No Glue Needed Waterproof Magnetic Lashes Set
Review Date: 2020/09/07
Store: UJM
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'UJM', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '4 x 4 x 0.3 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 4 x 0.3 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'UJM-004'}
Review Text: Oh these are rough. They look extremely false when on, and are very clunky. The magnetic eyeliner makes it harder to apply and keep these on. Also, if you get the eyeliner in your eye, you better have an eyewash station nearby. These are almost like toy false lashes for kids to play dress up with if the eyeliner wasn’t so toxic. The lashes (3 sets) come stacked in a compact that just feels breakable and not well made. The lashes themselves are very synthetic, and not natural looking at all. I like that the kit includes an eyelash tweezer applicator, but honestly that will be the only thing getting use from this kit. It’s a great concept, just poorly executed. The liner goes on and you have to quickly get the lashes placed, or you’ll lose adhesiveness by the second. Even when done in a timely manner, the magnetic components in the eyeliner don’t work well with the magnetic strip on the lashes, so they won’t stay on long. They are large and clunky and just look very unnatural, even when trimmed. The lashes themselves have a wire look and consistency to them, and look very similar to the lashes on a toy doll, only thicker and heavier looking. Would not recommend these, even for the low price.
Review Title: Very synthetic look and feel
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: minihope Women's Elastic Hair Tiea, Black, 120 Count (Pack of 1), 4MM for Medium Hair.Value pack.
Review Date: 2020/12/20
Store: minihope
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Material': 'Metal', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'minihope', 'Hair Type': 'Medium, Thick', 'Number of Pieces': '120', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 2.9 x 2.2 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ET-SET-200703', 'UPC': '725683672763 661757097431'}
Review Text: These are very good quality! The price point and value for your money is great. The hair ties are strong and don’t break like normal ones, and you get four packs of 30 bands and two beret clips for the price of one pack of normal hair ties. The brand is very user friendly and they left a cute little note in the package.
Review Title: Strong— good quality— great value
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MD Complete Bright & Healthy Vitamin C+ Vitalizing Face Serum| with Vitamin C, Vitamin E and Herbal Extracts | Potent Antioxidant Protection, Nourishes, Brightens and Evens Skin 0.5 fl oz
Review Date: 2020/12/20
Store: MD Complete by Dr. Brian Zelickson
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone, Sensitive', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'MD Complete by Dr. Brian Zelickson', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.05 x 1.63 x 3.75 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '850458005573'}
Review Text: I’m not a huge fan of face oils but this product is great! It goes on light and makes your skin feel moisturized while also giving it a natural glow and radiance. The smell is subtle but good, it smells vaguely like an orange, and goes on sheer and not greasy. I love that it’s giving my skin the extra vitamin C that it needs.
Review Title: Great sheerness and vitamin C content
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gel UV Nail Lamp, AsperX 150W LED Nail Dryer Gel Nail Polish Light Curing Lamp Kit Smart Auto-sensing with 10/30/60/99s Timer
Review Date: 2020/12/21
Store: AsperX
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AsperX', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '8.9 x 8.03 x 4.33 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '8.9"D x 8.03"W x 4.33"H'}
Review Text: This is a decent portable nail lamp. It’s affordable, very lightweight, easy to use, and comes with some accessories and the settings on the lamp are convenient. It takes a bit longer than I was hoping to fully dry, but after about 10 minutes, you’re good to go. I like this because it’s small and light so I can pack it with me anywhere. It is easy to use, and a child could use it (with supervision so they don’t look into the light) because you just slide your hand under the light and it will detect your hand and start the light/ drying process. I have noticed that the lag time seems to be getting longer on the motion detecting light, but it’s not extremely bothersome. Sometimes it takes a few swipes, but it generally works. It’s a great thing to have if you enjoy doing your nails at home, or even just a fun “spa” thing to do with your friends, or kids during winter and/ or quarantine. This is by no means a professional style nail lamp but for the price, it gets the job done.
Review Title: Lightweight, compact, easy/ fun to use
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LANGE HAIR Extendé Conditioning Detangler Hair Spray - Paraben Free Leave-in Conditioner Spray, Detangles and Hydrates Hair, Moisture & Shine | 4OZ
Review Date: 2020/12/21
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Helps protect color and reinforces strands, leaving them strong and vibrant', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.4 x 1.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '793150592708'}
Review Text: The scent is very refreshing and mild, it almost just blends with your shampoo/ conditioner. I spray a few pumps on my hair and smooth it in with a comb, and then let my hair air dry overnight and I’ve noticed a significant difference in frizz control. My hair kinda feels/ looks poofy and frizzy after I wash it and this product tames my hair without weighing it down at all. My hair just feels softer and smoother when I use it, but I don’t feel it in my hair at all, it quickly absorbs. I have long hair and this size is more of a travel size bottle for me, even using just a few pumps every few nights, I’m down to the last bit of product. I will likely order it again because it’s seamless for frizz, and I like how weightless it is.
Review Title: Controls frizz w/o adding weight to hair
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Dr. Denese SkinScience Essential Lipid Anti Aging Power Infusion Dry Oil - Skin Nutrients 97% Organic 100% Natural - Rejuvinating Blend with Amaranth & Resveratrol - Paraben-Free, Cruelty-Free - 2oz
Review Date: 2020/12/21
Store: Dr. Denese
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Dr. Denese', 'Item Form': 'Dr. Denese', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.57 x 3.15 x 3.07 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '800166A', 'UPC': '811684022284', 'Manufacturer': 'Dr. Denese'}
Review Text: This product is quite expensive but it packs a lot of great ingredients. Dr. Denese has a fantastic product line, and I love her magnetic face mask, amongst other things. I didn’t get this product for the anti-aging properties, but more for the moisture and exfoliating base. I use it after I cleanse and tone my face, let it fully absorb for a few minutes, and then apply my serums and/or just moisturizer. When I use it at night I find that my skin feels plumper and moisturized when I wake up. The 2oz bottle can stretch out over a long period of time too, so the product is worth the money, it’s just not quite in my everyday price range. I do like that I can cut out serums at night and still feel like I’m treating my face. I don’t have visible wrinkles yet so I haven’t seen any anti-wrinkle effects, but my skin does feel fuller, if that makes sense. My skin feels tighter in a good way, and my skin looks and feels softer and just overall more even looking.
Review Title: Moisturizing and “plumping” of skin
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:

    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details

    Structure your response as:
   
    SUMMARY:
    [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
This individual displays a preference for personal care products with natural ingredients and effective performance, particularly in skincare and grooming. They consistently rate products highly when they meet their standards for quality and functionality, as evidenced by their positive sentiments towards exfoliating facial cleansers, hair ties, and moisturizing serums. 

Common themes in their purchases show an inclination towards products that enhance grooming routines, especially for facial care and hair management. The person values effectiveness in products like scrubs and moisturizing agents, highlighting their expectations for clean, soft skin and manageable hair without added weight or greasiness.

Quality is a primary concern; they appreciate durable products (e.g., hair ties that don’t easily break) and are put off by synthetic materials, as seen with the negative review of magnetic eyelashes. Despite a low price sensitivity for some items, they are cautious with higher-priced options, indicating a willingness to invest in quality but within their comfort range. 

Overall, this individual favors high-performance, user-friendly beauty solutions that boost confidence and offer good value, displaying a discerning approach to skincare with a critical eye for quality and result-oriented products.

target_interaction.title: Half full bottle
target_interaction.text: I usually purchase this product via the manufacture. I saw the price was lower here and I purchased the serum. It arrived quickly but the bottle was about 1/3 empty. Even after letting it settle, it’s still about half- 2/3 full. I love the product, just wish the bottle was full.
target_interaction.title_meta: My Daily Dose of Uplift Serum
description: A custom pre-blended serum that delivers an anti-aging power punch, helping you with smoother, firmer and younger-looking skin.
